Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace comprised of two hundred and twenty three beads of different colours and materials: enamel and carnelian. Fifty-one ring-shaped carnelian beads, mostly translucent (three are opaque). One blue double-bead (double disc-shape: 0,55 x 0,6 cm), seven tube-shaped beads made of blue enamel, one double-bead of blue enamel (double spheres: 0,9 x 0,56 cm), two blue-green tube-shaped beads. Two sphere-shaped beads of black enamel (0,6 cm diametre), one black fluted bead (0,7 x 0,85 cm), twenty-eight ring-shaped beads of enamel, fourteen of which are blue, seven brown and seven others blue-green.
